reviews.review: Jesus

这是一名朴实憨厚为社会主义兢兢业业奋斗的农场主的故事。农场主每天早出晚归，工作踏实可靠。有一天受到了4个狡诈险恶的偷电贼骚扰，为了保护社会主义发电机，农场主拿出了玩具刀、玩具夹、玩具电锯等工具，想要吓走偷电贼。

发布于：2020 年 11 月 26 日 上午 9:51

I really liked the idea of the game. Started playing as a killer, there is a lot to learn and there is some challenge. I started trying killers until I chose one and started climbing the ranks. I played 50+ hours, and very fast I started hating the game. While I was between ranks 15 and 13, I started playing against ranks 1 to 10, and completely stopped having a chance to do anything. The survivors just don't fear you. They basically bully you, they taunt, they blind you with flashlights 3 or 2 at a time. They block your path, block the hooks, or destroy them when you are almost there. What is the point of being a killer that nobody fears? And is even more frustrating when you pick one that is slower than the survivors. They are 4 vs 1, they cannot kill you but they can make your life miserable. It does not feel a horror game at all, you are not in power as a killer, you are just a joke for the survivors. The worst part is that as soon as the game ends there is always someone writing "EZ" just to make you feel even worse.

From the other point of view, if you like to gang up with other 3 friends to make another person miserable, this game is four you.

Muito bom!
muito bom o game sai com depressão

I play this game since the day it came out and sadly, I cannot recommend it. And here is why:

Survivor: 

if you don't have 4man squad ready to go in, do not count on good experience. Solo games are extremely painfull and unfun. Other than that you will just meet camping tunneling killers to just make your life even more miserable, because why not. This game is no newbie friendly, you will die fast and all the time. Ranking is broken so you will be put against very experienced killers. And it takes very long time to get an idea how to become toxic survivor 

Killer:

Unless you are absolute genius, you will have very frustrating and annoying experience, especially when you go against red ranks full squads. And you will because ranking is completely broken. Prepare yourself for running in circles and pure desperation when you know that with every passing second you waste on chasing someone you loose the game. Very often you will be put in the situation when survivor will get free escape with keys and other fancy stuff. Because its not about mistakes you make, but how well the other side is prepared. You can camp and tunnel, but even that is very nerfed, so when you go against good team, you will just watch them leave. Every killer requires different skill set, if you want to be good at more than one, prepare to drop your life.


Game was in bad state and even with good effort it still is. If you want to have minimum chance of winning you will have to put many upon many hours. Grind is insane. With every patch come more bugs, some not resolved till this day. Lobbies are broken. Ranking is broken. Hit-boxes are broken. 

Even if the developer team seems like care, it doesn't show in the recent events. Before events were very good, satisfying and fun. Now it's lazy and "give me money"  type of events. Many skins in the game are just recycled recolors, bigger effort skins are locked behind paywall. Battle pass items are uninspiring and boring. Challenges for farming battle pas are boring and repetitive. It's all about doubling the amount > repair 5 generators < after two weeks >repair 10 generators<. There are challenges that are situational and you need pure luck to complete them. So in general, battle task are badly designed and boring.

Support for the game is bad and lazy. You are forced to contact random support person and there is no way to contact someone actually competent. When I have a problem with the game, those random people kept asking me for my data and disappear later, without a trace ( probably hoping that I would forget the issue that I have). I must say that they made my game working worse than it was before I asked for help. 
When you come across a cheater and decide to report him, prepare to feel like a criminal yourself. Support does not even read the support form, they either blindly send you fixes they have listed on their website or ask you for things they already received in the form. Very very very bad customer service and there is no one to even send a complain to. 


If you think you are going to meet nice people in this game, think again. Community is very toxic and unfriendly. Insults is a common thing after a match. Because this game has to make you feel even more like garbage than you are already feeling.  

It's also worth to note that this game has not yet have a good competitor in this field, so they dont have to work hard.

Cherry on the top is that they boldly put social politics in the game, which is unacceptable. Keep your politics and ideologies for yourself. 


If you want grindy, frustrating time, sure, knock yourself out. But I would say, skip it and wait for a decent competition to come out. 

It's not a horror game. It's a low grade circus.
